feels.name: Trust
feels.quote: He remained unaltered by all their efforts and expostulations, and allowed our adventurer to enjoy the triumph of his praise, while he himself was conscious of his own superiority in those qualifications which seemed of more real importance than the mere exteriors and forms of life.

causedBy.name: Being conscious of his own superiority

feels.name: Joy
feels.quote: He was ravished with the prospect of enjoying such a companion.

feels.name: Submission
feels.quote: His present ambition was not to make a figure at his fatherâ€™s table, but to eclipse his rivals at school, and to acquire an influence and authority among these confederates.
